about.subtitle: Who I am
about.content_1: I decided to change my professionnal career to become a web developer. After self-learning the fondamentals of HTML, CSS and Javascript, then I could test the framework Vue in frontend and php with Laravel in backend. In 2023 I studied with the online education Openclassrooms with the goal of working as a professsional and become a Javacript web developer.
about.content_2: On this portfolio you can check my personnal projects and my works with Openclassrooms. Click on an image to watch a demonstration of the site. All the codes are available on my github.

footer.subtitle: Website coded with React and Node JS
